item.title: How to set up a blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: Introduction So you want to set up a blog. Here is how to do it in 10 minutes or less. Create new GitHub repository Create a folder to work in, run npm install hugo-bin --save-dev Clone your GitHub under the same directory Run npx hugo new site <your repository root folder name> Navigate to the repository root directory Add a theme as Git Submodule: git submodule add --depth=1 https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod.git themes/PaperMod Update config.
